## Name

<span class="mh">Servings:</span> 3 servings
<br>

<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>4 cups chopped tomatoes (5-6 roma tomatoes)</li>
  <li>1 clove garlic, minced finely</li>
  <li>1 TBSP olive oil</li>
  <li>&frac12; tsp sea salt</li>
  <li>&frac14; tsp black pepper</li>
  <li>2-3 cups fresh basil leaves, finely sliced</li>
</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>In large bowl, place all ingredients and gently toss to combine</li>
  <li>Best to make in morning and put into refridgerator for a few hours prior to serving so that the garlic/basil/tomato flavors have time to combine</li>
</ol>
</div>


<span class="mh">Notes:</span> Usually mix with spaghetti on a hot summer day, also works great on toasted bread

<span class="mh">Source:</span> Mom got it out of a 'Clean Eating' book I think
